text.value: Great news! Please continue to closely monitor her.
Is she still experiencing any danger signs?
Please indicate which danger signs is experiencing.
should visit the health facility immediately if she is experiencing any of these danger signs.
Please advise her to do so and accompany her if possible.
Did visit the health facility as recommended?
Family/community members involved in care of mother/baby/child
Who will give blood if needed?
Who will go to provide care along the way?
Who will care for the children at home?
Who will decide to get help?
What money will money will be used?
Where will patient go for medical help?
Who will give permission for travel?
Who decides there is a problem?
Who will be responsible for the money?
EMERGENCY PLAN FOR MOTHER AND BABY:
Individuals involved know when to activate plan?
Commitment to protect life of mother/baby by all involved?
Danger signs reviewed with everyone involved in plan?
Verbal agreement on plan by all involved?

bind.calculate: if(selected(../fever, 'yes') or selected(../severe_headache, 'yes') or selected(../vaginal_bleeding, 'yes') or selected(../vaginal_discharge, 'yes') or selected(../convulsion, 'yes'), 'yes', if(selected(../severe_headache, 'no') and selected(../vaginal_bleeding, 'no') and selected(../vaginal_discharge, 'no') and selected(../convulsion, 'no'), 'no', ''))
